list.name: Changes
list.comment: Update merge_data.py to remove direct_low/low/lowest_list imputation, avoid sales_history aggregation, drop all-NaN card_sku_ids, add low/lowest_list NaN flags, include 5 samples in JSON diagnostics

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_ADD_EXTERNAL_FILES": "true", "Python tests.Python tests in test_logger.py.executor": "Run", "Python.clean_data.executor": "Run", "Python.clean_logs.executor": "Run", "Python.cratch_test_clean_data.executor": "Run", "Python.error_handler.executor": "Run", "Python.fetch_card_data.executor": "Run", "Python.fetch_market_data.executor": "Run", "Python.logger.executor": "Run", "Python.merge_data.executor": "Run", "Python.pipeline.executor": "Run", "Python.scratch_merge_data.executor": "Run", "Python.scratch_test_clean_data.executor": "Run", "Python.scratch_test_listings_out_of_stock.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "editor.preferences.pyOptions" }, "keyToStringList": { "com.intellij.ide.scratch.ScratchImplUtil$2/New Scratch File": [ "Python" ] } }

task.summary: Default task
Update fetch_market_data.py to add 60-day limit to all queries and filter by sales_history with >= 12 sales
Update project_status.json to mark fetch_market_data complete and start clean_data
initial clean_data.py
Update fetch_card_data.py to merge card_list.csv and card_attributes.csv
Add clean_data.py with multiple outlier removal strategies for sales_history
Update fetch_market_data.py to correct price columns by dividing by 100
Fix clean_data.py to inherit fetch_market_data DataFrames and address Pandas warnings
logs and project status
Update project_status.json to reflect clean_data test error and ongoing fixes
Update project_status.json to reflect clean_data test error resolution

Update project_status.json with clean_data requirements - Specified IQR as primary outlier removal method, testing additional methods - Updated listings handling to denote dropshipper_out_of_stock and no-seller-inventory - Added skewness, kurtosis, volatility to price metrics Files: project_status.json

Simplify listings query in fetch_market_data.py - Removed price_rank <= 5 filter to capture all listings - Retained card_sku_id filter for >= 12 sales over 60 days - Added pd.to_numeric for robust price handling - Added is_low_inventory flag for direct_inventory_count <= 5 Files: src/data_collection/fetch_market_data.py

Update project_status.json with recent progress - Added simplified listings query in fetch_market_data.py - Noted data ingestion issue and missing days in listings - Planned imputation strategy for clean_data.py - Updated issues and notes with diagnostic findings Files: project_status.json

Update project_status.json with merge progress and Timestamp issue - Added TypeError: Timestamp not JSON serializable as issue - Noted merge_data progress with granular and aggregated listings - Updated sales_history outlier filtering and encoding preferences Files: project_status.json

Update project_status.json with merge progress and issues - Noted high NaNs in sales_history post-merge - Updated merge_data testing with granular and aggregated results - Documented sales_history outlier filtering and Timestamp error fix Files: project_status.json

Update project_status.json with comprehensive merge findings - Detailed outlier removal, market NaNs, and date normalization theories - Noted successful merge run and merge_data.py plan Files: project_status.json

Update project_status.json with outlier and timestamp findings - Added outlier distribution analysis and IQR 3.0 results - Confirmed intraday timestamps and zero-filled sales_history plan Files: project_status.json

Add merge_data module for granular merging - Implemented granular merge with asymmetric IQR (low: 1.5, high: 4.0) - Filled missing sales_history days with zeros - Handled ET timestamps Files: src/data_processing/merge_data.py, src/data_processing/__init__.py

Update project_status.json with successful merge and reduced NaNs - Noted 3.65% outlier removal and 1.86% sales_history NaNs - Added clean_data.py plan with direct_low flagging Files: project_status.json
Update merge_data.py with dropshipper out-of-stock flag - Added is_dropshipper_out_of_stock for direct_low NaNs Files: src/data_processing/merge_data.py
Add clean_data.py skeleton - Implemented direct_low flagging, missing day handling, and encoding Files: src/data_processing/clean_data.py
Update merge_data.py with outlier validation - Added 25x, 50x, 100x sales_price_max vs. direct_low validation Files: src/data_processing/merge_data.py
Update general_preferences.json with new project_summary.json rule - Added rule to document data handling and strategies Files: general_preferences.json

Finalize merge_data.py with IQR 5.0 and carry-forward imputation - Integrated IQR high multiplier 5.0, carry-forward imputation, and card_attributes filtering - Fixed pandas deprecation warnings Files: src/data_processing/merge_data.py
Create project_summary.json with initial data handling details - Documented strategies and stats for merge_data.py Files: project_summary.json
Update merge_data.py with diagnostic output - Added JSON diagnostic output and outlier validation (25x, 50x, 100x) Files: src/data_processing/merge_data.py
Update project_summary.json with merge_data.py results - Updated stats based on latest merge_data.py run Files: project_summary.json
Update merge_data.py with enhanced logging and diagnostics - Added input validation and ensured diagnostic JSON output Files: src/data_processing/merge_data.py
Update project_summary.json with diagnostic issue resolution - Noted merge_data.py diagnostic issue and resolution Files: project_summary.json

Update merge_data.py with full granular merge logic - Implemented complete merge logic with outlier filtering, aggregation, imputation, and detailed diagnostics Files: src/data_preprocessing/merge_data.py
initial pipeline implementation.
Update project_summary.json with pipeline design - Added pipeline strategy with modular switches - Noted merge_data integration resolution Files: project_summary.json
Update merge_data.py for pipeline integration - Removed __main__ block to prevent double-calling modules - Added input logging for pipeline debugging Files: src/data_preprocessing/merge_data.py
Fix pipeline.py NameError - Added pandas import to resolve pd undefined error Files: src/pipeline.py
Update project_summary.json with pipeline fix - Documented resolution of pipeline.py NameError Files: project_summary.json
Fix pipeline.py TypeError - Renamed merge_data argument to run_merge_data to avoid function shadowing Files: src/pipeline.py
Update project_status.json with pipeline progress - Moved pipeline to completed modules - Added pipeline.py naming conflict issue and resolution Files: project_status.json
pipeline and merge_data update with new chat.
project status update
Update general_preferences.json to clarify full file updates and Ctrl+K commit message prompts
Update merge_data.py to adjust IQR high_multiplier to 10.0, add is_missing_day flag for listings, and exclude direct_low zeros in outlier validation
Update merge_data.py to flag extreme outliers, add timing logs, and ensure error logging
Combine project_status.json and project_summary.json into a single project_status.json, removing redundancy
Update merge_data.py to use forward-fill, add raw direct_low NaN diagnostic, flag all_direct_low_nan, output extreme outliers and random samples, move outlier filtering to clean_data.py
Update general_preferences.json to reference project_status.json instead of project_summary.json
Update merge_data.py to remove direct_low/low/lowest_list imputation, avoid sales_history aggregation, drop all-NaN card_sku_ids, add low/lowest_list NaN flags, include 5 samples in JSON diagnostics
